name: North Denmark EU Office
goal:
Place North Denmark on the international map and represent local and regional authorities of the North Denmark Region towards the EU.

To get EU-funding for Northern Jutland
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Communication, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, Institutional affairs, International co-operation and development, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Migration and asylum, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Single market, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport, Youth
